Trade/Device Name(s): COBAS AMPLICOR CT/NG test for Chlamydia trachomatis
Roche Scripts for COBAS AMPLICOR CT/NG Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for COBAS AMPLICOR CT/NG test and Roche Scripts accessory for automated detection of Chlamydia trachomatis DNA using PCR on urine and swab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Roche Scripts for COBAS AMPLICOR CT/NG Test provide software scripts to automate sample processing on the Tecan Genesis RSP 150 Workstation for analysis with COBAS AMPLICOR CT/NG assay systems to detect Chlamydia trachomatis DNA in urine and swab specimens
